user.coffee

¶ 
class User
¶

Represents a participating user in the chat.

id - A unique ID for the user. options - An optional Hash of key, value pairs for this user.

 
  constructor: (@id, options = {}) ->
    for k of (options or {})
      @[k] = options[k]
    @['name'] ||= @id

module.exports = User
